content: janam: - balaheenarum paapikalumaaya njangalutemel anu grahangalum karunayum randu lokangalilum ennume nnekkum choriyappetumaaraakaname. Aammeen.

items.content: urakkamillaattha unarvvallavanaaya ente kartthaa ve! Ninte unarvvine sthothram cheyyuvaanaayittu paapa muzhukalil ninnu njangalute urakkatthe unartthaname. Maranamillaattha jeevanullavane! Ninte karunaye vandi ppaanaayi maranavum naashavumaakunna urakkatthil ninnu njangalute maranatthe nee jeevippikkaname. Pithaavum puthranum parishuddharoohaayume! Svarggatthilum bhoomiyilum sthuthikkappettavanum vaazhtthappettavanum nee aakayaal ninne sthuthikkunnavaraaya svarggeeyamaalaakhamaarute maha tthuvamulla vrundangalotorumicchu vishuddhiyotukooti ippozhum eppozhum ennekkum ninne sthuthicchu vaazhtthuvaan njangale yogyaraakkaname. Aammeen.

content:
1. Nammute rakshakanaa kabareennuyir poondi
ngettoru raavilnaamellaarumurakkamunar-
nnonnaayu sthuthi paateetenam.

2. Njaayar divasamathil dyvasuthan kabarin
ulleennettu - sthuthi sakalaadhipanennevam
sabhayum makkalumaarkkunnu.

3. Moonnaam naal mrutharee-nnuyir poondattavanaam
mashihaa paapa-kkuzhiyil ninnum maranatthil
ninnum njangale ettenam.

4. Younaan than saadya-shyam pol muppakalum
raavum bhoovi-nnul mevi thaan moonnaam naal
jeevicchuyirtthezhunnettu.

5. Jayaveeryatthotaa- kabareennettavanaam
aprathyakshan - thannaadyanthaviheena sutha-
nnaayi sthuthi naamettenam.

/tnjangalute kartthaave! Njangalotu karuna cheyyaname. Njangalute kartthaave! Krupayundaayi njangalotu karuna cheyyaname. Njangalute kartthaave! Uttharamaruliccheythu njangalotu karuna cheyyaname. Njangalute kartthaave! Ninakku sthuthi. Njangalute kartthaave! Ninakku sthuthi. Ennekkum njangalute sharanavume ninakku sthuthi. Baarekmor.

vinnulakinnarachanthaan than sabhaye panithathine
aakki thannaasthaanam pukkathinulla vaanu.
Kartthaa thannotu samsaa-rikkendunnavarellaam
sabhayulpukatteyithaa - thaanathil meveetunnu.
Haaleluyyaa u haaleluyyaa sabhaye valartthunnavane
/tkrupa cheytheetatiyaaril.

mashihaathan manavaatti - aayeetum shuddhasabha
bhaagyangal poornnamathaam - parudeesaa sadrushamaho.
Maamodeesaayumathil - sahader thannasthikalum
poojaapeedtavumundu - enthi jeevoshadhiye
haaleluyyaa u haaleluyyaa bhaagam cheythekeetum
/tkahanenmaarkalumundu.

rakshaakarane nin്re mukham kaanmathinu virodhikkalle,
/tninnuththaanam ka-ndaasthreevarggattho-
tatiyaar manavarayullil pu-kkaanandippaaraakenam.

Shaapappetta yoodanmaar - aanikal veekkiya thrukkykal
/tkatamaakum katalinnatiyaare ketti
nindyatthinmakkupthatthil - ninningu valiccheetenam

chinthappetta nin raktham njangate karakal thutacchellaam
/tnin thirumeni poru-ppicchee punnukale .
Skeeppaamel veraaya ni-nnuyiratiyaare cherkkenam.

1. Uththaanatthaal than sabhaye veendonaam puthraa!
Nin shyno nalki than prajaye kaakkenam nee.

2. Doothavyooham mannanu maanam nalkaanetthi
gabreeyelyar rakshakasavidham kaahalamoothi.

3. Thiruvullatthaal nidraavashanaayezhunnettonaam
unarvvallone kaanaan vaanavavrundam thaanu.

4. Njangalkkaayi peedaamaranam kykkondettam
deepthyaa jeevan praapicchone, sthothramaroopee

5. Thaathan roohaa ennivaroppam rakshaka! Ninne
jeevipporum mrutharum vaazhtthum krupa cheyyenam.

6. Vin man lokarkkykyam nalkeetum shyno nin
uththaanatthaal nin sabhayil shyno nalkenam.

/tnjangalute kartthaave! Njangalotu karuna cheyyaname. Njangalute kartthaave! Krupayundaayi njangalotu karuna cheyyaname. Njangalute kartthaave! Uttharamaruliccheythu njangalotu karuna cheyyaname. Njangalute kartthaave! Ninakku sthuthi. Njangalute kartthaave! Ninakku sthuthi. Ennekkum njangalute sharanavume ninakku sthuthi. Baarekmor.

krooshil thookki-cchaa sehaane nee-
/tkkiya mashihaa sthuthyan
/tsabhaye otthu vivaaham thaan
/tsabha thanne sthuthi cheythettam
etthi jaathikalellaa de-shattheennum sthuthi paati than
uththaanatthil modikkunnu.

vellankikkaa-raam prabha poondore
/t kabarinatukkal kaa-
/tvalkkaar kandittangoti
/tkandaalum mudrakkallaal
mootiyavan kabaril ningal minnalkkoppam nilkkunnu”
/tennum chollippukkurshlemil. Subtext: moriyo raahemmelynu aadaaryn.

njangal than kartthaave! Nee
kaarunyam cheyu njangal mel
svaathanthuryam njangalkkuththaa
natthaal thannonaam puthraa!

Ipperunnaalil kartthaave!
Tharanam njangalkkulvenma
sthuthi perunnaalkalkkeeshannum
mutiyavaye choottunnonum.

/tshuddhikal naathaa! Shuddhaa ni-
/tnnotu thaathannum roohaaykkum
/thaaleluyyaa paataan nja-
/tngalkkekeetenam shuddhi.

Njangal than kartthaave! Nee
kaarunyam cheyu njangalmel
svaathanthuryam njangalkkuththaa-
natthaal thannonaam puthraa!

/tatiyaare uththaanatthaal
/trakshicchonaam mashihaa! Nee
/tnalkeetenam punyam nja-
/tngalkkum vaangippoyorkkum.

kartthaave! Nalkaashvaasam nin salbhavanangalkkullil
/tvaangippoyorkkaayu krupayee njangalkkum
atiyaarkkumavarkkum pattum - kuttangal maatteetenam.

/tnjangalute kartthaave! Njangalotu karuna cheyyaname. Njangalute kartthaave! Krupayundaayi njangalotu karuna cheyyaname. Njangalute kartthaave! Uttharamaruliccheythu njangalotu karuna cheyyaname. Njangalute kartthaave! Ninakku sthuthi. Njangalute kartthaave! Ninakku sthuthi. Ennekkum njangalute sharanavume ninakku sthuthi. Baarekmor.

/tkartthaave aashvaasam nalku
uththaanatthin naalolam - thaalkkaalikamaamee jeevan-
vitta pithaakkalkkum - bhraathyajanangalkkum
kaanthiyezhunnarakalkkullil nalkeetaashvaasam
avare orkkum naal kabaru-llasthikalariyenam
/tnin kalpana manmayaraamaa-
/tdaamyarkkuyirekitumpol
kaanthiyaninjittavar ninno-toppam manavarayil pooki
uyirekum ninne - sthothram cheyyenam.

aarkkaayu kaazhchakaliviteyana-ykkunno bhaagyamavannettam
mel svarggatthilava - nnormmayathundaakum.
Gothrapperukalormmaykkaayu - kartthaavin mumpil
kaanmaan kallukalil mooshaa - kotthiyathorkkumpol
/tningal than mrutharperukale
/torkkaanum palliyilivite
ezhuthaanum, melsvarggatthil mashihaathan varavil thanno-
tavar modippaanum - cherppin pristthaayil.

1. Karuna niranjavane! Punaruththaanatthil
ninnute srushttiye nee puthuthaakkeetaname.

2. Ninnil sharanatthaal nidrayilaayu ninte
varavinu kaattheetum mrutharil kaniyaname.

4. Vannavanaam varuvonum mruthar thannuyirum
sthuthanennu shareeraathmaakkal paataname.
